context_bundle.summary: Startup folder persistence for user-mode auto-launch. No admin rights or Task Scheduler needed. Copy script/shortcut to shell:startup, runs on login. Critical for daemon persistence.

onboarding.quick_start: Copy daemon script to $env:APPDATA\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\Startup. Or use: Copy-Item script.ps1 (New-Object -ComObject Shell.Application).NameSpace('shell:startup').Self.Path
common_patterns: Or create shortcut pointing to powershell -File daemon.ps1

known_errors.solution: Create shortcut with: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File daemon.ps1
known_errors.prevention: Use shortcut wrapper instead of raw .ps1
